modName: Easy WheelMenu - Realistic Needs and Diseases 2
summary: This mod allows to map shouts of Realistic Needs and Diseases 2 mod to the menu of Easy Wheelmenu.
descriptionHtml:
[u][b]Objective of this mod :[/b][/u]

To use simple action you have to cast a power spell. With this mod, you can execute actions throught the menu interface provided my Easy Wheelmenu mod.
No more need to switch off your precious Gaan Lah Hass if want to check your needs or have an happy drink from a (not so clean) river.

[u][b]Requirement :[/b][/u]
This mod needs :
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78785]Realistic Needs and Diseases 2[/url]
- [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69878?tab=description]Easy Wheelmenu[/url]

No particular load order is needed.

[u][b]Acknowledgments :[/b][/u]
[list]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/32303475]CrEaToXx[/url] for the mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78785]Realistic Needs and Diseases 2[/url]
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/6240905]Kesta[/url] for the mod [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69878?tab=description]Easy Wheelmenu[/url]
[*]All the people involved in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859]TES5Edit[/url] (used to create this mod)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/16837129]Amadar[/url] for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74672]PapyrusCompilerPlus[/url]﻿ (used to compile the unique script)
[*][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1100552]Tannin [/url] for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1334]Mod Organizer[/url]﻿ (used for creating my workspace)
[/list]
author: ZoboZeWarrior
